txt.en: You aren't entirely sure what this barricade is meant to accomplish
A villager wants to know if there are salvageable materials in the nearby bandit camp.
Tell Peran that you have examined the supplies at the camp.
The wood is rotten and foul smelling. It won't be of much use to anyone.
The smell of rot wafts up from the pile of lumber. It is of no use to anyone
'Some bandits have made camp west of here. They have not bothered us here in Dínadab in some time. Could you check on the camp for me? Tell me what you find.'

'Just as I thought: they have barely anything to their name but the clothes on their backs. Why continue to live out there when they could come home? Lamedon has no shortage of honest work that needs doing.'
Someone has laid out good clothing and leather armour
A villager wants to know what might be found at the nearby bandit camp.\n\nInvestigate the bandit camp west of Dínadab.
